shallow_squat.explain: Hip stays above knee at the bottom. Aim for hip crease below knee for full depth.

excessive_forward_lean.explain: Torso leans forward too much at the bottom, indicating limited ankle/hip mobility or bracing.
drills: Front squats light focus on upright torso (3x6)

knee_valgus.explain: Knees collapse inward relative to ankle width.
drills: Tempo squats focusing on knee tracking (3x6)
